description: Try our easy to follow 4-Step Meat-Free Pizza recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Vegetable pizza,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Tree nut free,Egg free,Healthier Easier,Low sugar,Mushroom,Halal,Quick & easy dinner,High protein,High fibre,Vegetarian,Low fat,Peanut free
name: 4-Step Meat-Free Pizza Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 400g can diced tomatoes with basil and oregano

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 240Â°C. Place 2 baking trays into oven.
Place bread on 2 sheets of baking paper
Mash tomatoes in a bowl with a fork. Spoon onto bread and spread evenly. Top bread with mushroom, cheese and capsicum.
Slip baking paper with pizzas onto hot trays and return to oven. Bake for 10 minutes or until cheese is melted and bases are crisp. Top with rocket and serve with a mixed green salad.
